1.label: Upper paddle buttons mode
1.description: Configuration of Pair Mode for the upper two buttons (Button #1 and #2)

options.label: Separately (Default)
In pair mode, left side sends on/up commands, right side sends off/down commands

2.label: Middle paddle buttons mode
2.description: Configuration of Pair Mode for the middle two buttons (Button #3 and #4)

options.label: Separately (Default)
In pair mode, left side sends on/up commands, right side sends off/down commands

3.label: Lower paddle buttons mode
3.description: Configuration of Pair Mode for the lower two buttons (Button #5 and #6)

options.label: Separately (Default)
In pair mode, left side sends on/up commands, right side sends off/down commands

4.label: LED #1 mode
4.description: Configuration of the internal operation of LED #1

options.label: LED indication is disabled (LED can ce controlled by Indicator Command Class Set commands)
LED indicates the status of the corresponding button (Default)
LED indicates the status of the corresponding button, with inverted indication
LED indicates the status of the corresponding paddle (in pair mode)
LED indicates the status of the corresponding paddle (in pair mode), with inverted indication
LED indicates the status of the built in relay
LED indicates the status of the built in relay, with inverted indication
LED show a 5 seconds indication when the corresponding button is pressed

10.label: Relay mode
10.description: This parameter configures which of the buttons that shall control the built-in relay, or if the relay only will be activated for one second, each time button #1 is used

options.label: Relay is disabled
Relay is controlled by button #1 or by upper paddle when pair mode is active (Default)
Relay is controlled by button #2 or by upper paddle when pair mode is active
Relay is controlled by button #3 or by middle paddle when pair mode is active
Relay is controlled by button #4 or by middle paddle when pair mode is active
Relay is controlled by button #5 or by lower paddle when pair mode is active
Relay is controlled by button #6 or by lower paddle when pair mode is active
Relay is activated for one second and is controlled by button #1 or by upper paddle when pair mode is active

11.label: Disable Central Scene notification
11.description: Disables or enables the sending of Central Scene notifications

options.label: Central Scene notifications are enabled (Default)
Central Scene notifications are disabled

12.label: Disable House Cleaning Mode
12.description: Disables or enables that a double-press on a button wil send a command to activate 100% light

options.label: House Cleaning Mode is enabled (Default)
House Cleaning Mode is disabled; double-press button scene notifications will be disabled too

13.label: Multilevel Switch on single press for device 1 (button #1)
13.description:
Byte 1: Enable / Disable 0 = Disabled - When single pressing the button, nodes associated to group 6 wont be switched. 1 = Enabled - When single pressing the button, nodes associated to group 6 will be switched between the configured upper and lower switch values. (Default) 
			Byte 2: Upper switch value: 0 - 99, 255; When single pressing the button for ON, a Multilevel Switch Set with this value will be send to devices in association group 6. (Default = 255) 
			Byte 3: Lower switch value: 0 - 99; When single pressing the button for OFF, a Multilevel Switch Set with this value will be send to devices in association group 6. (Default = 0) 
			Byte 4: Not used - must be set to 0.

14.label: Multilevel Switch on single press for device 2 (button #2)

Byte 1: Enable / Disable 0 = Disabled - When single pressing the button, nodes associated to group 6 wont be switched. 1 = Enabled - When single pressing the button, nodes associated to group 6 will be switched between the configured upper and lower switch values. (Default) 
			Byte 2: Upper switch value: 0 - 99, 255; When single pressing the button for ON, a Multilevel Switch Set with this value will be send to devices in association group 6. (Default = 255) 
			Byte 3: Lower switch value: 0 - 99; When single pressing the button for OFF, a Multilevel Switch Set with this value will be send to devices in association group 6. (Default = 0) 
			Byte 4: Not used - must be set to 0.

19.label: Controll of assosiation groups for device 1 (button#1)
19.description: Enable or disable if received commands are relayed to the nodes in the assosiation groups

options.label: When commands are received by device 1, nodes in the association groups will not be switched, button activation will still send switch values
When commands are received by device 1, nodes in the association groups will be switched. (Default)

options.label: When commands are received by device 2, nodes in the association groups will not be switched, button activation will still send switch values
When commands are received by device 2, nodes in the association groups will be switched. (Default)

When commands are received by device 6, nodes in the association groups will be switched. (Default)
Backlight is only controlled by Indicator Command Class - commands send to endpoint 0
Backlight is turned on for 5 seconds when a button is pressed. (Default)

26.label: Basic Set for endpoint 0
26.description: Enable or disable that Basic Set commands to the root device will be able to control the backlight

options.label: Basic Set commands to endpoint 0 is forwarded to endpoint 1 (Default)
Basic Set commands to endpoint 0 controls backlight (on/off)
